title: st. simeon
content:
simeon on the pillar
do you hear the wind?
and all that chatter below
does it make a difference?

i wonder if you ever speak
or did you realize no one listens?
would you shout or would you whisper
knowing neither would make the distance

simeon on the pillar
i see you standing there and smiling
what insight did you find up there?
and what secret is silence hiding?
